ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Hey Everyone!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Curapachi! I am Durgaa, lvl24 FEW Ranger from Felwithe! If you happen to play on the Solusek Ro server look me up!
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Curapachi! I am Durgaa, lvl24 FEW Ranger from Felwithe! If you
happen to play on the Solusek Ro server look me up!

> -----Original Message-----
> Message: 3
> Date: Sun, 28 Dec 2003 23:45:38 -0000
> From: "Ashley" <inuyashagrl88@...>
> Subject: Hey Everyone!!!
>
> Hi everyone whatz up?? I am really looking for some friends on
> everquest so i can meet people outside of my own hometown. When i
> play the game it seems like everyone is busy and really doesnt want
> to talk so i decided to come to a group where i could meet some
> people and talk and become friends in the game! So if anyone is
> interseted in becoming friends please reply or maybe chat with me
> while on everquest if ya see me!! My Name on Everquest is Curapachi
> and i am a level 10 bard/wood elf. I hope i meet ya there and we can
> become friends! Bye!!!
